resources.string: The smart mattress system provides notifications on your mobile phone when your infant makes too many exaggerated movements or actually attempts to vacate their crib.

Activate:
Click the [Activate] button to begin monitoring your infant’s activity. Be sure to calibrate the Smart Mattress system prior to the first activation.
Calibration: Place your infant on the mattress and click the [Calibrate] button to set the sensor baseline. The calibration will require updating as your infant grows.

Sensitivity:
Adjust the sensitivity of the system to your infant’s activity levels. Decrease the sensitivity when movement notifications are too frequent. Active infants require a low sensitivity setting and those that are less active require a high sensitivity setting.
